_header: Our pains been grill and fell
_description: Beware of Hell — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Oure peynes ben grille & felleBe war of þe pit of
                    helle
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 20.
